item.title: Big shake-up in Nigerian politics as heavyweights join forces
item.description: The two main opposition leaders have split from their parties to contest the next election under a new banner.

item.title: Gaza hospital director killed in Israeli strike, relative says
item.description: Dr Marwan Sultan was killed along with several family members in a strike on his home.

item.title: Wildfire forces evacuation of thousands on Greek island of Crete
item.description: The blaze has been raging since Wednesday and fire crews say the conditions are creating new flare-ups, making containment efforts extremely difficult...

item.title: Six dead, dozens missing after ferry sinks off Bali
item.description: The boat was carrying 53 passengers and 12 crew when it sank while on its way to Bali from Java island.

item.title: Ryanair cancels flights for 30,000 passengers due to French strike
item.description: Airlines and France's transport minister has condemned the strikes as unacceptable, at the start of summer holidays.
